originalText.text: Terrible customer service no supervisor noone helps over an year its been charging me even though ive deleted account months ago noone can tell anything because they dont know they tell me that they cant find my email .. logicly geniuses ive deleted it 7 month ago but im getting charged anyway eventhough ive canceled paid cancelation fee

originalText.text: I don't know where else to post how awful and glitchy Adobe Acrobat PRO is....so I will do it here.  It doesn't run properly on Chrome..or anywhere else.  It is difficult to use and is beyond me how PDF became a standard. BOOOO, I should get better software for my subscription.

text.text: I don't know where else to post how awful and glitchy Adobe Acrobat PRO is....so I will do it here.  It doesn't run properly on Chrome..or anywhere else.  It is difficult to use and is beyond me how PDF became a standard. BOOOO, I should get better software for my subscription.

originalText.text:
I have been a associate with Adobe for many years and remember their first adobe photo shop that my father still has and runs on an old Xp system I built him! This operation I watch grow into a monster that was blessed with incredible success. In the past when needed they helped me or we helped each other! I highly recommended them for all user needs! Being a good customer and friend I was surprised at the difficulty my mother and I experience just with purchasing a popular application? I was even more surprised at indirect correspondence as if pirating their product! Even more surprised that they did not want to assist me because did not go to them directly, even though my team had tried prior with them not available!? What upset me was Adobe thinking the reason why the down loading was slow due to my end? However, I was not surprised when they could not fulfill my request this one time!  The Covid 19 has brought this company an overwhelming flood of business!  My request is that Adobe remember their success is because of the customers! Do not take advantage of the standard customer by taking their money first and providing support later! Cash and support simultaneously is the best policy and I expect under normal conditions for the people I recommend to Adobe. In closing please remember Xmas is a lot of things except a pirate of software! Disqualification is lifted due to operating under the Covid 19 flag with some concern, but must overlook ! The flood of second level techs including Lavish was appreciated and their customer care good! Long waits and down loads extremely slow, but give adobe three stars and will do a announce visit in 6 months to see if better! Customers with little IT experience please wait for any of these types of purchases!
Best Regards,
Xmas

originalText.text: I have spent 2 hours working with someone who couldn't resolve my problem with Adobe Acrobat DC.  Now I am getting new error messages.  I am praying that my PC isn't damaged by the support person messing around in my Registry.  This isn't the first time I have had issues with this application.  For the money I spend on it monthly its ridiculous.  I need to find another application that works better than this.  I also need to work with tech support that can actually resolve issues instead of wasting my time.  I absolutely don't recommend using this product.
